message.entry: FilterSize parameter must be a scalar or 2-element vector of positive, odd integers.
Sigma is expected to be a scalar or 2-element vector of positive values.
Not enough inputs to imflatfield. Expected at least two inputs.
Expected all function inputs to be non-empty.
Input image was expected to be either an RGB color (M x N x 3) or grayscale (M x N x 1) image.
Input image and input mask are not the same size.
